items.title: Danish startup FlatPay joins the club of European fintech unicorns to track
items.description: Flatpay’s bet is that it can challenge larger players by charging small merchants a flat transaction rate to use its card terminals and point-of-sales...

items.title: Beloved SF cat’s death fuels Waymo criticism
items.description: The death of a neighborhood bodega cat named Kit Kat has shaken San Francisco’s Mission District and prompted new debates about robotaxi safety.

items.title: ‘Buy Now, Pay Later’ is expanding fast, and that should worry everyone
items.description: As Morris watches his BNPL investments from the other side of the table, he seems to understand the warning signs better than most.

items.title: Are we nearing the end of Apple’s Tim Cook era?
items.description: Apple is getting serious about succession planning, according to a new report.

items.title: Amazon satellite network gets a rebrand — and drops its affordability pitch
items.description: The company has been quietly changing how it talks about who its internet customers will be before it announced a big name change last week.
